responses.rationale: The segment describes case locations without using intensifiers or risk adjectives.
The segment reports a confirmed case without using intensifiers or risk adjectives.
The segment contains the intensifier 'so' modifying the risk-adjective 'infectious'.
The segment reports data on confirmed cases without using intensifiers or risk adjectives.
The segment describes the spread mechanism without using intensifiers or risk adjectives.
The segment provides production statistics without using intensifiers or risk adjectives.
The segment provides production statistics without using intensifiers or risk adjectives.
The segment reports the number of birds killed without using intensifiers or risk adjectives.
The segment reports the total number of birds killed nationally without using intensifiers or risk adjectives.
The segment reports new cases and the number of birds killed without using intensifiers or risk adjectives.
